SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, ROWNUM as rn FROM ( SELECT supply_plan_detail_code, supply_plan_code, product_code, product_color, product_size, supply_qy, supply_date FROM SUPPLY_PLAN_DETAILS ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end} ) page WHERE page.rn >= #{start}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, ROWNUM as rn FROM (SELECT r.return_code, r.delivery_code, r.company_code, r.company_name, r.requestor, r.request_date, count(p.product_code) as count FROM returns r JOIN return_product p ON r.return_code = p.return_code
AND p.processing_status = 'ER03' AND p.show = 'on'
AND r.return_code LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{returnCode}) || '%'
AND r.requestor LIKE '%' || #{requestor} || '%'
AND TRUNC(r.request_date) >= TO_DATE(#{startRequestDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND TRUNC(r.request_date) <= TO_DATE(#{endRequestDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND TRUNC(r.request_date) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startRequestDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{endRequestDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
GROUP BY r.return_code, r.delivery_code, r.company_code, r.company_name, r.requestor, r.request_date ORDER BY r.request_date desc ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end} )page WHERE page.rn >= #{start}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, ROWNUM as rn FROM ( SELECT d.delivery_code, d.order_date, d.dedt, COUNT(i.product_code) AS delivery_qy FROM delivery d JOIN delivery_details i ON d.delivery_code = i.delivery_code
AND d.company_se = 'CP01' AND i.delivery_qy > 0 AND d.delivery_status = 'DS01'
AND d.delivery_code LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{deliveryCode}) || '%'
AND d.order_date >= TO_DATE(#{startOrderDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND d.order_date <= TO_DATE(#{endOrderDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND d.order_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startOrderDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{endOrderDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND d.dedt >= TO_DATE(#{startDedt}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND d.dedt <= TO_DATE(#{endDedt}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND d.dedt BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDedt}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{endDedt}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
GROUP BY d.delivery_code, d.order_date, d.dedt ORDER BY d.delivery_code )a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end}) page WHERE page.rn >= #{start}

SELECT r.product_code, r.product_name, SUM(r.qy) AS qy, SUM(r.qy) - NVL(SUM(i.store_qy), 0) AS not_store_qy, NVL(SUM(i.store_qy), 0) AS store_qy FROM return_product r LEFT JOIN inventory i ON r.return_code = i.return_code AND r.product_code = i.product_code AND r.product_size = i.product_size AND r.product_color = i.product_color WHERE r.return_code = #{returnCode} GROUP BY r.product_code, r.product_name

SELECT d.product_code, p.product_name, d.product_color, SUM(DISTINCT d.delivery_qy) as productQy, sum(distinct d.delivery_qy) - sum(nvl(i.store_qy,0)) as qy, SUM(i.store_qy) as totalQy FROM delivery_details d LEFT join inventory i on d.delivery_code = i.delivery_code AND d.product_color = i.product_color left join product_info p on d.product_code = p.product_code WHERE d.product_se = 'PT01' AND d.delivery_code = #{deliveryCode} group by d.product_code, p.product_name, d.product_color
